content:
GIFT: Wild Mage-talent awakened—immense destructive power, uncontrolled, type uncertain (possibly Firestarting or raw magic). Channels burned open, severe Gift-shock. Commitment: testimony to Haven about attack. Carries bandit's blade wrapped in red robe hood as evidence.

Gift-shock stabilized with herbs; collapsed into healing sleep for four days. Now in Healers' Collegium care at Haven. Committed to contingency: ordered Senta to knock him out if he loses control. Memories of Lisle attack blocked by trauma.

White Companion mare, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. Adult 3 years, unpartnered until now. STANCE-Rance: Chose him—bond formed, stabilizing his Gift/channels with unconditional love. Frustrated by his stubbornness but committed. Knows he caused Lisle's destruction (he doesn't fully accept this yet). Herding him to safety/Haven. Practical, occasionally indignant, wry humor.

STANCE-Rance: growing attachment and protectiveness; matches his stubbornness; won't leave his side. Believes his Gift is rarer/more dangerous than Firestarting—possibly unprecedented in 500 years, no one capable of training him. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement (captives for ritual sacrifice). Promised to knock Rance out if he loses control.

Made contingency to knock Rance unconscious if he loses Gift control. STANCE-Rance: protective; concerned about political dangers; pride mixed with worry over his impossible feats; exasperated by his spite-driven rule-breaking.

STANCE-Rance: fierce protectiveness; admiration for leadership under uncertainty; monitors threats to him constantly.

Experienced entire sexual encounter through unavoidable bond with Talia; reactions: embarrassment, concern about timing, reluctant fascination, pragmatic worry. STANCE-Rance: Accepts relationship has become intensely complicated; resigned understanding mixed with concern; maintains supportive role despite discomfort witnessing intimacy.
Small Valdemar village near Karse/Rethwellan/Menmellith borders. STATUS: Obliterated—leveled by Rance's awakened Gift during bandit attack. Crater at epicenter, ash and charred foundations remain.

Organized group masquerading as bandits (red robes hidden under bandit garb). Attacked Lisle to capture villagers—purpose unknown. Fled toward Menmellith after Rance's Gift exploded. Possible cult/sect. May return to confirm attack success.

Queen's Own Companion. Greeted Senta at Haven; offered support; confirmed Healers would care for Rance.

Talia's Companion, Queen's Own Companion. Attended Circle meeting without his Chosen. Positioned beside Rance throughout report—presence lent legitimacy to extraordinary claims. Centuries-old perspective; assessment suggests grave concern tempered with hope. STANCE-Rance: monitoring; appears to endorse despite unprecedented circumstances.

Queen's Own Herald. Complete mind-merge with Rance—he now possesses all her memories, training, state secrets; she received his trauma memories. Currently with Healer Crescent, overwhelmed but unharmed. Rance helped her process deeply buried trauma during merge—arranged marriage escape, Empathy awakening struggles, fear of losing identity, constant responsibility pressure. STANCE-Rance: profoundly intimate knowledge shared; boundaries violated but ultimately therapeutic; complicated mix of gratitude and vulnerability.

STANCE-Rance: seeks his counsel before presenting plan to Selenay; considers him relevant stakeholder in decisions affecting both; uses formal cadence around weighty matters. STATE: Resolved after night's deliberation—reached decision about managing shared-memory crisis; emotional state controlled/certain. Herald Queen's Own meeting Selenay after this discussion.

STANCE-Rance: Sexually claimed; surrendered virginity and control completely; discovered arousal from degradation/domination—responds intensely to being called 'Holderkin bitch/slut,' being ordered to degrade herself; begged to be used/marked/filled; conflicted between queenly dignity and newly awakened submissive desires but chose submission willingly. Bite bruise on breast; soreness from rough first sex. Decision solidified: wants formal co-advisor arrangement with Selenay's knowledge only; accepts their bond is now intimate partnership beyond professional. Vulnerability: years of denying personal needs shattered; found liberation in surrendering responsibility during sex.

Queen of Valdemar. Received report of first Mage-Gift since Vanyel's time coinciding with Karsite blood magic resurgence. Authorized quartering at healer's cottage, discreet inquiries to allies. Privately drinks '47 vintage during audiences (detail only Talia should know—now confirmed by Rance). Calculating political ramifications of two people possessing Queen's Own knowledge. STANCE-Rance: grateful for warning; deeply unsettled by his possession of Talia's intimate knowledge; assessing unprecedented security vulnerability.

True Herald-Mage potential—not manifested in Valdemar since Vanyel's time. Rance possesses it; awakened violently during Lisle attack, leveling entire village. Enables complete mind-merge (previously thought impossible), forceful untrained Mindspeech that breaks through shields. No living teachers remain; training must be improvised from sealed archives. Information restricted to Circle only due to political implications.

Sun-Priests suspected of returning to human sacrifice and demon summoning. Special forces taking live captives across borders—all ages, suggesting ritual use rather than slavery. Military-grade equipment (officer-class blades, recent manufacture within 2 years) indicates state sanction, not rogue elements. Represents fundamental policy shift; officially condemned for generations but historically cyclical during internal instability.

Old cottage in Companion's Field. Assigned as Rance's quarters—remote enough to contain Gift incidents without threatening Collegium, close enough to avoid isolation, allows discreet meetings. Strategic choice to maintain appearance of normal trainee status while managing unprecedented situation.
